name: cobalt
description: The CLUI is a unified command system for the web inspired by the project built by [replit](https://docs.replit.com/misc/clui). The CLUI has the speed of a CLI while having the convenience of a UI. Instead of fumbling through CLI documentation, spend more time running commands by using the CLUI's integrated form system to easily understand and fill out parameters and arguments.
author: Vandesm14
